name: Kthulhu Kerfuffle
description: Description On an island not so far away, a heroine is in possession of an egg that can cause the world to go into complete darkness if Cthulhu gets his tentacles on it. Play as the protector in this keep away game by using your keyboard and mouse. Controls WASD - Movement Mouse - Camera Spacebar - Jump, press twice for double jump Shift - Dash Esc - Pause
